Jointly estimate soft labels, HRF (in an fmrihrf basis), and a
multivariate decoder directly from fMRI time series and fmridesign
event/baseline models.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`aggregate_events()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/aggregate_events.md)
  : Aggregate TR-level soft labels to events
- [`continuous_mvpa_design()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/continuous_mvpa_design.md)
  : Continuous-time MVPA design wrapper
- [`estimate_rank_auto()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/estimate_rank_auto.md)
  : Estimate nuisance rank from whitened residuals
- [`fit_hrfdecoder()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/fit_hrfdecoder.md)
  : Fit HRF-aware weakly supervised decoder
- [`hrfdecoder_model()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/hrfdecoder_model.md)
  : Create an hrfdecoder model spec for rMVPA
- [`predict_hrfdecoder()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/predict_hrfdecoder.md)
  : Predict with an hrfdecoder fit
- [`scale_color_albers()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/scale_color_albers.md)
  : Albers Color Scale for ggplot2
- [`scale_fill_albers()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/scale_fill_albers.md)
  : Albers Fill Scale for ggplot2
- [`theme_albers()`](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/reference/theme_albers.md)
  : Albers Minimalist ggplot2 Theme

# Articles

### Tutorials

Start here for a guided introduction to hrfdecoder. These tutorials walk
you through the core workflow step by step.

- [Getting started with
  hrfdecoder](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/articles/01-getting-started.md):

  Quick tour of the core workflow for HRF-aware weakly supervised
  decoding.

### How-tos

Task-oriented recipes for specific use cases. Each guide focuses on
solving one particular problem.

- [AR prewhitening for temporal
  autocorrelation](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/articles/02-ar-prewhitening.md):

  Handle fMRI temporal autocorrelation with autoregressive prewhitening.

- [Integrating with rMVPA
  workflows](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/articles/03-rmvpa-integration.md):

  Run searchlight analysis and cross-validation using the rMVPA
  framework.

### Explanations

Conceptual deep dives into how hrfdecoder works. Learn about the
algorithms, design decisions, and theoretical foundations.

- [Understanding HRF
  estimation](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/articles/04-hrf-estimation.md):

  Learn how hrfdecoder jointly estimates the hemodynamic response
  function.

- [Weakly supervised learning for
  fMRI](https://bbuchsbaum.github.io/hrfdecoder/articles/05-weakly-supervised.md):

  Deep dive into the alternating least squares algorithm and parameter
  tuning.
